subject: Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The magic of the golden era of Cyclones basketball, when Johnny Orr was the men’s coach from 1980 to 1994, has returned to Ames, Iowa, with Fred Hoiberg.
snippet: The magic of the golden era of Cyclones basketball, when Johnny Orr was the men’s coach from 1980 to 1994, has returned to Ames, Iowa, with Fred Hoiberg.
